name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker executed malicious scripts to compromise sensitive data on key servers.

action--0d48eabe-6cd2-47e2-b3f9-49a1f34f.name: Kill malicious script process
action--0d48eabe-6cd2-47e2-b3f9-49a1f34f.description: Terminate any processes related to the malicious PowerShell script.

parallel--a72edfd0-e052-44ff-8d5e-b42e59.name: Execute further mitigations
parallel--a72edfd0-e052-44ff-8d5e-b42e59.description: Perform isolation, log auditing, and malware scanning concurrently.

action--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5ea1.name: Isolate affected hosts
action--b58e6315-8c3c-4b67-8414-a67c5ea1.description: Drop outgoing traffic from affected hosts to prevent further compromise.

commands.command: for host in host-21 host-22 host-23; do ssh $host 'iptables -A OUTPUT -j DROP'; done

action--cd216f6f-e4f9-4455-8c44-75d6eb58.name: Audit script execution logs
action--cd216f6f-e4f9-4455-8c44-75d6eb58.description: Search script execution logs for further malicious activity.

action--467f33cd-cd3b-44e8-ade4-dc8f097e.name: Conduct system-wide malware scan
action--467f33cd-cd3b-44e8-ade4-dc8f097e.description: Perform a thorough malware scan of the entire system to detect threats.

loop--f8207177-28f7-4a14-accd-e92bc6b3f4.name: Repeat malware scan
loop--f8207177-28f7-4a14-accd-e92bc6b3f4.description: Repeat the malware scan until no malware is found.
